attributes.action:
Tougher restrictions, Full UK Lockdown! 
Essentials only
attributes.additional_details:
The covid 19 cases are getting out of control, the public are not listening to the restrictions already there needs to be tougher restrictions to keep us safe to give the vaccine and chance. 

People are using excuses to gather in each others homes, taking unnecessary trips to the coffee shops and gathering in public areas, this is getting out of control the current restrictions are simply not good enough this time.
attributes.background:
Lock the country down to only essential shops and work only. 
No coffee shops, no outdoor gatherings, only essential work within the home for example emergency’s or elderly care. 
The same lockdown we had in March.
